DOC.brief_summary: Aerosol delivery mechanical ventilation long long debated topic . As evidence- base knowledge delivery aerosol lung mechanically ventilate patient increase , one piece puzzle remain unexplored ; measurement clinically relevant outcome . The primary aim research compare clinical outcome ( ventilator- associate event ( VAEs ) , length stay ( LOS ) intensive care unit ( ICU ) total day mechanical ventilation ) use traditional jet nebulizer versus new generation vibrate mesh nebulizer mechanical ventilation . The secondary aim research identify source bacteria obtain culture nebulizer ventilator circuit plat colony growth identification .
DOC.brief_title: RCT Mesh Versus Jet Nebulizers Clinical Outcomes During Mechanical Ventilation Intensive Care Unit
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study design randomize , control trial compare clinical outcome contamination rate jet nebulizer versus vibrate mesh nebulizer . The sample size one consecutive convenience entire year ( September 2013-September 2014 ) include season . The study perform Rush University Medical Center ( RUMC ) Chicago , IL . Each mechanically ventilated patient within inclusion criterion , physician order aerosol treatment , randomize either jet nebulizer mesh nebulizer group use SPSS computer software . The respiratory care staff place nebulization device ventilator circuit per hospital protocol . Both device , jet mesh nebulizer , currently standard practice , therefore hospital protocol follow regard placement administration order aerosol treatment . The study subject remain device randomize duration hospital stay order obtain clinical outcome data . Study staff notify patient extubation mechanical ventilation , discharge intensive care unit expiration , conclude participant involvement study . Retrospective clinical outcome data obtain study subject 's electronic medical chart conclusion study . Retrospective data include : 1 . LOS ICU ( day ) 2 . LOS mechanical ventilator ( day ) 3 . Drug administration information 1 . Drug dose order 2 . Number treatment deliver 3 . Treatment type - Continuous - Intermittent 4 . Ventilator-Associated Tracheobronchitis ( # VATs ) 16 . Fever , increase volume purulence secretion , positive culture ( quantitative semi- quantitative ) respiratory sample ( tracheal aspirate bronchoscopic specimen ) , absence new evolve pulmonary infiltrate chest x-ray patient mechanical ventilation > 48 hour 5 . Ventilator-Associated Events Adults15 1 . Ventilator-Associated Condition ( # VACs ) - After period stability improvement ventilator , patient least one follow indication worsen oxygenation : - Minimum daily FiO2 value increase ≥ 0.20 baseline remain increase level ≥ 2 calendar day . - - Minimum daily PEEP value increase ≥ 3 cm H2O baseline remain increased level ≥ 2 calendar day . 2 . Infection-related Ventilator-Associated Complication ( # IVACs ) - On calendar day 3 mechanical ventilation within 2 calendar day onset worsen oxygenation , patient meet follow criterion : - Temperature > 38˚ C < 36˚ C , white blood cell count ≥ 12,000 cells/mm3 ≤ 4,000 cells/mm3 . AND - A new antimicrobial agent ( ) start , continue ≥ 4 calendar day . 3 . Possible Ventilator-Associated Pneumonia ( # Possible VAPs ) - On calendar day 3 mechanical ventilation within 2 calendar day onset worsen oxygenation , ONE follow criterion meet : - Purulent respiratory secretion - Positive culture 4 . Probably Ventilator-Associated Pneumonia ( # Probable VAPs ) - On calendar day 3 mechanical ventilation within 2 calendar day onset worsen oxygenation , ONE follow criterion meet : - Purulent respiratory secretion ( one specimen collections- define possible VAP ) one follow ( positive culture endotracheal aspirate , positive culture bronchoalveolar lavage , positive culture lung tissue , positive culture protect specimen brush - One follow without requirement purulent respiratory secretion ( positive pleural fluid culture , positive lung histopathology , positive diagnostic test Legionella , positive diagnostic test respiratory secretion influenza virus , respiratory syncytial virus , adenovirus , parainfluenza virus ) The Jet Nebulizer Protocol : - Physician order receive subject , randomization jet nebulizer occur . - Jet nebulizer , Misty Max 10™ ( Carefusion , CA ) , place spring load t-piece humidifier ventilator ( approximately 15 cm gas outlet ) . - Aerosol treatment deliver per physician order flow rate 8-10 L/min . - Jet nebulizer replace every 3 day per hospital protocol . 1 . Prior every nebulizer change every 3 day , study staff notify order obtain culture . 2 . Cultures - Jet Nebulizer Culture ( 3 plate ) : Sample collect jet nebulizer run oxygen flow 8-10 L/min nebulizer ( 3 mL normal saline reservoir ) direct nebulizer towards plate 1 minute . Process repeat 3 different plate . Plates label , edge seal tape , place biohazard bag send microbiology lab analysis . 1 . Plate 1 : MacConkey agar ( id gram ( - ) organisms ) 2 . Plate 2 : Chocolate agar ( id fastidious organism ) 3 . Plate 3 : Blood agar ( id gram ( + ) gram ( - ) organism ) - Ventilator Circuit Culture : Material collect rim inspiratory ventilator circuit wye rub sterile swab along circuit 3x circular motion . Swab seal test tube lid send lab analysis . - Sputum sample : Data obtain per electronic medical chart . Sputum sample data analyze study order physician . - After obtain culture , jet nebulizer replace new one label per hospital protocol . - Further culture necessary unless patient identify study staff VAE . ( appendix A ) - Study staff notify patient extubation mechanical ventilation , discharge intensive care unit expiration . The Vibrating Mesh Nebulizer protocol : - Physician order receive subject , randomization vibrate mesh nebulizer occur . - Aeroneb® Solo ( Aerogen , Galway , Ireland ) vibrate mesh nebulizer place heater `` dry side '' heater water chamber inspiratory ventilator circuit . - Aerosol treatment deliver per physician order . - Mesh nebulizer replace every 30 day per hospital protocol . 1 . Prior every nebulizer change every 3 day , study staff notify order obtain culture . 2 . Cultures - Vibrating Mesh Nebulizer Culture ( 3 plate ) : Sample collect vibrate mesh nebulizer direct nebulizer ( 3 mL normal saline reservoir ) towards plate 1 minute . Process repeat 3 different plate . Plates label , edge seal tape , place biohazard bag send microbiology lab analysis . 1 . Plate 1 : MacConkey agar ( id gram ( - ) organisms ) 2 . Plate 2 : Chocolate agar ( id fastidious organism ) 3 . Plate 3 : Blood agar ( id gram ( + ) gram ( - ) organism ) - Ventilator Circuit Culture : Material collect rim inspiratory ventilator circuit wye rub sterile swab along circuit 3x circular motion . Swab seal test tube lid send lab analysis . - Sputum sample : Data obtain per electronic medical chart . Sputum sample data analyze study order physician . - Vibrating mesh nebulizer replace new one label per hospital protocol . - Further culture necessary unless patient identify study staff VAE . ( appendix A ) - Study staff notify immediately patient extubation mechanical ventilation , discharge intensive care unit expiration .
DOC.criteria: Age > 1 y/o Intubated endotracheal tube ( ETT ) mechanical ventilation Patient intensive care unit Rush University Medical Center Physician order aerosolize breathe treatment medical record Age < 1 y/o Diaphragmatic paralysis Paraplegic high spinal cord injury Brain death
